mapper.sql: id, kb_id, parent_id, name, post_id, sort_num
mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE dir_tree AS ( -- 递归基：根目录（parent_id IS NULL） SELECT id, kb_id, parent_id, name, post_id, sort_num FROM directories WHERE kb_id = #{kbId} AND parent_id IS NULL UNION ALL -- 递归体：子目录 SELECT d.id, d.kb_id, d.parent_id, d.name, d.post_id, d.sort_num FROM directories d JOIN dir_tree dt ON d.parent_id = dt.id ) SELECT id, kb_id, parent_id, name, post_id, sort_num FROM dir_tree ORDER BY sort_num
